name: Orb's Date
description:
GAME MADE FOR FRIEND, SOME SCENES MIGHT BE INAPPROPRIATE

go get that bread - Tung T. Tran

From Box Butt Land to Orb

browser version isn't the best due to the engine I used (Renpy) so I highly recommend downloading the game for the best experience.

if you want to play on browser, Firefox should be able to run it.

if anyone has difficulty downloading the game please DM me on Discord - Tung T. Tran
